sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO sboard (unq, title, pass, name, content, hits, rdate, category) VALUES (board_seq.nextval, #title#, #pass#, #name#, #content#, 0, sysdate, #category#)
sqlMap.select:
select b.* from( select rownum rn, a.* from( select unq, title, name, hits, to_char(rdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate, category from sboard
where $searchGubun$ like '%' || #searchText# || '%'
order by unq desc) a ) b where rn >= #startIndex# and rn <= #endIndex#

select count(*) total from sboard
where $searchGubun$ like '%' || #searchText# || '%'
